alert.note: Alert for Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:05PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Big Haynes Creek at Bald Rock Road near Milstead affecting Rockdale and Newton Counties. For the Yellow River Basin...including Suwanee, Lawrenceville, Plantation Rd Lawrenceville, Tanglewood Drive Snellville, Lilburn, Snellville, Snellville, Silver Hill Rd Stone Mtn, Lithonia, Stone Mountain, Lee Road below Snellville, Lithonia, Lithonia, Lithonia, Milstead, Gees Mill Road, Snellville, Loganville, Milstead, Milstead, Milstead, Rocky Plains...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Haynes Creek at Bald Rock Road near Milstead. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands along the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Bald Rock Road near the Georgia International Horse Park. Low lying portions of residential backyards on Highlands Forest Lane...Highlands Creek Way and Highlands Ridge Lane begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 14.4 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:45 AM EST Wednesday was 14.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.2 feet on 02/07/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1215 AM EST.
